abstract: The AMC drama averaged just 2.3 million viewers at 10 p.m., down from 3.4 million from the premiere a year ago.
snippet: The AMC drama averaged just 2.3 million viewers at 10 p.m., down from 3.4 million from the premiere a year ago.
lead_paragraph: Viewers seem to be a little less mad about “Mad Men,” as the much-honored AMC drama enters the first half of its final season: Ratings were down a steep 34 percent on Sunday night for the seventh season premiere.

headline.main: Steep Drop in Ratings as ‘Mad Men’ Begins Its Final Season
headline.print_headline: ‘Mad Men’ Ratings Decline by 34% in Season Premiere
